# .StreamApi

[**v1StreamStreamPatch**](StreamApi.md#v1StreamStreamPatch) | **PATCH** /api/v1/stream/{stream_id} | Patch Stream
[**v1StreamStreamUpdate**](StreamApi.md#v1StreamStreamUpdate) | **PUT** /api/v1/stream/{stream_id} | Update Stream
